Title: Two Boats and a Helicopter
Writer: Tom Perrotta (based on the book by), Damon Lindelof (created by), Tom Perrotta (created by), Damon Lindelof, Jacqueline Hoyt
Actors: Justin Theroux, Amy Brenneman, Christopher Eccleston, Liv Tyler
Plot: Reverend Jamison is struggling with people referring to the departed as heroes. He is faced with death threats and a diminishing attendance at his sermons and then finds out he may lose his church due to foreclosure.
